channel.title: Series on Log4j Exploitability Index
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Log4j Exploitability Index

item.title: Salesforce Service Cloud
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Salesforce Statement https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=000363736&type=1 Community Notes Source Note CISAGov “Service Cloud is reported to be affected by CVE-2021-44228. The service is being updated to remediate the vulnerability identified in CVE-2021-44228.” CISAGov Last Update: 12/15/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-17 14:04:59 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Salesforce Slack
